group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.

group_1.textCenter: I couldn't just let Tsuyu transform into a Witch@and forsake the people.
Besides, I thought it was my duty to put her@to rest.
But when we were face-to-face, I couldn't bring@myself to do it, and she turned the tables on me.
But I wanted to save Tsuyu, even if I had to@transform, too…
I wanted to kill the thing that had consumed her.
Please… Even if I must become something else,@I want to leave my mark forever.
So when you find that Witch, please avenge us!
So please let it reach Tsuruno and Sana…!
